title: Daily Schedule Pie Chart
description: Visually design your daily routine with a clean pie chart! Input time and activities, auto-fill the schedule, and download your result as an image. Perfect for productivity tracking and daily planning.

title: Instagram Story Effecter
description: Transform your photos with edgy visual effects! Upload an image and apply unique glitch, pixelation, zoom, burn, and shuffle effects. Perfect for eye-catching Instagram stories. Download your animated GIF in seconds.

title: Record & Compare Clothes Sizes
description: Save and easily compare your clothing measurements! Enter and store your exact sizes locally to simplify online shopping and ensure the perfect fit every time.

title: Instant photo Pixelator
description: Instantly pixelate your photos! Select an image, adjust pixelation levels, and download your stylish retro creation in seconds. Ideal for creative social media posts and artistic projects.

title: Multi YouTube Player
description: Watch multiple YouTube videos simultaneously! Add video links, sync playback, and customize the layout for a seamless viewing experience. Ideal for multitasking, comparisons, and mixed playlists.

title: Chord Transposer Â±
description: Transpose and analyze chords with ease! Enter your chords, shift them up or down in key, and visualize chord progressions instantly. Perfect for musicians and composers.

title: Image Transparency Adjuster
description: Easily adjust the transparency of images with a simple slider. Upload an image, control its opacity, and download the processed image in PNG format while maintaining transparency.

title: Guitar Tuner
description: Easily tune your guitar with real-time pitch detection! Select a string, play the sound, and get instant feedback on whether your note is sharp, flat, or perfectly tuned.

title: Word Chain Game
description: A fun and interactive word chain game! Players take turns entering words that start with the last letter of the previous word. Simple yet challenging gameplay with a 30-second input cooldown.

title: PhotoMemo
description: Capture memories effortlessly with PhotoMemo! Take photos, add personalized notes, and save them as stylish polaroids. Perfect for journaling, event planning, or sharing moments with a creative touch.

title: D-day Date Calculator
description: D-day Quickly calculate the number of days between two dates or find the future/past date by adding or subtracting days. Perfect for planning events, tracking deadlines, or counting special days.

title: BMI Calculator
description: Easily calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) with this app. Enter your height and weight to get your BMI and its classification (e.g., normal, underweight). Features a simple interface and results visualization with dynamic pointers.

title: Typing Speed Tester
description: Measure your typing speed and accuracy with this engaging tool. Practice with various difficulty levels, share your results, and challenge your friends. Perfect for improving typing skills while having fun.

title: Memory Card Game
description: Challenge your memory with this fun and engaging emoji matching game. Flip the cards, find matching pairs, and race against the clock. Features include dynamic emoji sets, a built-in timer, and performance-based emoji rewards based on your speed. Perfect for casual gaming and brain training.

title: Morse Code Translator
description: Easily translate English to Morse code and vice versa. Features include real-time translation, audio playback, and a built-in Morse code reference table for quick learning. Perfect for enthusiasts and learners alike.

title: Reaction Time Tester
description: Test your reaction speed with this simple and engaging app. Touch the box as quickly as possible when it turns green and measure your response time. Features include colorful feedback, emoji-based performance ratings, and a share button to challenge friends.

title: PDF Splitter
description: Split your PDF into individual pages with ease. Features include page previews, single-page download options, and a user-friendly interface. Ideal for managing documents efficiently and extracting specific pages as needed.

title: HandsFree Timer
description: Track time hands-free with this interactive timer. The timer resets when a hand is detected in front of the camera, allowing you to manage time without touching your device. Features include adjustable sensitivity, real-time timer display, and visual feedback.

title: Light Level Meter
description: Measure real-time light levels in your environment. Features include maximum and average lux tracking, elapsed time display, and a visual light level bar. Ideal for photography, indoor lighting, or ambient monitoring.

title: Noise Level Meter
description: Measure real-time noise levels with a dynamic and sleek interface. Features include maximum and average noise tracking, elapsed time display, and a visual sound level bar in vibrant colors. Perfect for environmental monitoring, personal use, or fun noise detection.
